title: im level 11 trying to get to 30, looking for people to play with mics. more info below...
body: im a good support/adc with ashe, i play very well considering my rank in my opinion. looking for solid skilled people to play with mics who wanna win but be chill and have fun! please have curse or discord. i do not like teamspeak but will use if necessary. hmu

replies.body:
I can only grind ai games with you
Add JannaIce (copy it)

Support ashe.. O_O

Well, in all honestly, basically anything works at lv11. I think i played teemo with 3-5 blade of the ruined king, and it was relatively good.
This was back when you could lifesteal turrets.
no im not surfing but i do know how to play i dont suck lets put it like that lol
Are you a legitimate level 11 or are you smurfing?
